rationale: The segment reports sample analysis and lack of confirmed cases, with no intensifier modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: A reference lab in Espirito Santo is analyzing samples from the man and 32 other people who also work at the park, it [the ministry] added, pointing out that no confirmed cases of influenza A have ever been reported in the country.
